original_text: But those people will have to explain to God what they have done. He is ready to judge every person, whether they are alive now or they have already died.
korean_text: 그들이 산 자와 죽은 자를 심판하기로 예비하신 이에게 사실대로 고하리라

sentences.original_text: But those people will have to explain to God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 사람들은 하나님께 설명해야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He is ready to judge every person
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 모든 사람을 심판할 준비가 되어 있습니다
